DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 , randomize , double-masked , placebo-controlled study ataluren patient aniridia cause nonsense mutation . Patients receive mask study drug 48 week follow open-label ataluren another 48 week . Safety efficacy assess .
DOC.criteria: Age ≥2 year Body weight ≥12 kg Documentation presence nonsense mutation 1 allele PAX6 gene Clinical diagnosis aniridia 20/200 bad visual acuity well eye best correction . Subjects monocular . Subjects history complicate ocular surgery
